dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3716273Y] Copyright Act Infringement
dmca.body: -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2007 2:27 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3716273Y] Copyright Act Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Act Infringement Added by system at Sunday, Apr 1 2007 07:24 pm X-MailFrom: mike@myhelphub.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Apr 1 19:24:25 2007 Received: (qmail 2368 invoked by alias); 2 Apr 2007 00:24:25 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 2365 invoked from network); 2 Apr 2007 00:24:25 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 Apr 2007 00:24:25 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 1 Apr 2007 19:24:18 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 01 Apr 2007 19:24:18 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mike@myhelphub.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HYALH-0005tC-PI; Sun, 01 Apr 2007 19:24:15 -0500 Received: from mail.myhelphub.com ([206.196.28.170]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mike@myhelphub.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HYAL6-000BX7-4H; Sun, 01 Apr 2007 19:24:04 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=----_SmarterMail_NextPart_7331545455036253 Date: Sun, 1 Apr 2007 20:23:45 -0400 Received: from [71.76.129.46] by mail.myhelphub.com via HTTP; Sun, 1 Apr 2007 20:23:45 -0400 Subject: Copyright Act Infringement From: "Mike" Reply-To: mike@myhelphub.com To: CC: Message-ID: <2ed12d227fce4432beffc65ceff70e4d@myhelphub.com> Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of myhelphub.com designates 206.196.28.170 as permitted sender) client-ip=206.196.28.170; envelope-from=mike@myhelphub.com; helo=mail.myhelphub.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Apr 2007 00:24:18.0508 (UTC) FILETIME=[409DE8C0:01C774BD] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) April 2, 2007 The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite #110 Dallas, TX 75027 69.56.229.59 Sirs: OFFICIAL DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT INFRINGEMENT DEMAND This letter demands that you immediately cease and desist the use of copyrighted materials, currently hosted by your company, specifically: http://www.wellnesstools.com I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that the information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. This letter is an official notification under provisions of section 512(c) of the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringement listed in this location, which infringes on copyrighted content currently hosted online at: http://www.lucid-dreaming-kit.com/ The above site and all related material is wholly owned and copyrighted by my client, White Cliff Computing Ltd (http://www.whitecliff.net/). As a miscellany, you can actually verify that the theft has taken place yourself: If you visit http://www.wellnesstools.com/dreammaker_info.htm you will note that the individual has still left the original sales text and images inside the stolen pages. We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the infringing material, as specified by the DMCA, and insure the user refrains from using or sharing such materials in the future. You are required under law to provide a prompt response to this request. If I do not hear from you within 7 days, this action will be referred for further legal action. Regards, Michael Sheffield Legal Counsel to White Cliff Computing Ltd http://www.whitecliff.net/ Michael J. Sheffield Legal Counsel, WCCL Network E-mail: mike@myhelphub.com Web: www.wcclnetwork.com ---------------------------------------- THIS E-MAIL MAY CONTAIN INFORMATION THAT IS CONFIDENTIAL AND/OR LEGALLY PRIVILEGED. IF YOU ARE NOT THE INTENDED RECIPIENT, PLEASE DO NOT READ IT, DELETE IT IMMEDIATELY AND INFORM WHITE CLIFF COMPUTING LTD MIME element (text/html) April 2, 2007
